src:
Ośmiu wspaniałych. Monfils przegrał i stracił szansę na mistrzostwa

02 Nov 2019, 07:57







Djoković pokonał Tsitsipasa w ćwierćfinale turnieju w Paryżu



Grigor Dimitrow pokonał Dominika Thiema w ćwierćfinale ATP w...

Tenisiści rywalizują w Paryżu Foto: PAP/EPA | Video: Eurosport

Po porażce z Kanadyjczykiem Denisem Shapovalovem 2:6, 2:6 w ćwierćfinale turnieju tenisowego ATP Masters 1000 w Paryżu Francuz Gael Monfils stracił szansę na awans do kończących sezon zawodów ATP Finals w Londynie. Na jego przegranej skorzystał Matteo Berrettini.



23-letni Włoch jako ostatni zapewnił sobie udział w tej prestiżowej imprezie. Gra w niej jedynie ośmiu najlepszych zawodników danego roku.
Berrettini pierwszym Włochem od 1978 roku
Wcześniej miejsce w turnieju zapewnili sobie: lider światowego rankingu Serb Novak Djoković, obrońca tytułu Niemiec Alexander Zverev, Hiszpan Rafael Nadal, Szwajcar Roger Federer, Austriak Dominic Thiem, Grek Stefanos Tsitsipas i Rosjanin Daniił Miedwiediew.Berrettini jest pierwszym Włochem od 1978 roku, który znalazł się w czołowej ósemce sezonu.W Paryżu w półfinale - oprócz Shapovalova - zagrają Djoković, Bułgar Grigor Dimitrow i Nadal. W pierwszej rundzie turnieju w stolicy Francji odpadł Hubert Hurkacz.Wyniki ćwierćfinałów:Novak Djoković (Serbia, 1) - Stefanos Tsitsipas (Grecja, 7) 6:1, 6:2 Denis Shapovalov (Kanada) - Gael Monfils (Francja, 13) 6:2, 6:2 Grigor Dimitrow (Bułgaria) - Cristian Garin (Chile) 6:2, 7:5 Rafael Nadal (Hiszpania, 2) - Jo-Wilfried Tsonga (Francja) 7:6 (7-4), 6:1
Autor: rk / Źródło: PAP
text:
Learn How to Date from Animals
02 Nov 2019, 07:59 by Tempo.co, Yayuk Widiyarti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Lots of things can be learned from animals, including dating and attracting the attention of potential partners. Not all creatures are destined together. In fact, there are many couples, one of whom is more prominent than their partner.
If you are curious about what animals teach dating tips, consider the following review from Boldsky.
1. Most animals will attract potential partners with their own scent. In fact, even humans have natural scents that are different from one another, when they feel they meet potential partners, the body automatically emits these unique scents.
So, what can we learn from this? If by chance the body's natural scent is less pleasant, don't hesitate to use perfume. Hate using perfume? At least eat nutritious food and exercise diligently. Both of these are proven to be able to help improve body scent.
2. A loving touch. Do you know the reason why pets like dogs love to be petted? Because, the dog enjoys your caresses. When the dog's head is caressed with affection, he will feel comfortable. Humans, too, have proven to be able to release chemical compounds that can make your bond and your partner stronger and cause feelings of pleasure. So, frequently touching, caressing, and rubbing your partner so that the bond gets stronger.
3. Some types of birds attract the attention of prospective partners by dancing. And it turned out to work in humans. Dancing is able to shape the body while maintaining fitness. When it comes to dancing, it is very necessary to coordinate body movements according to the rhythm of the music. Coordination is the key to attracting the opposite sex.
4. Most birds and other animals desperately guard their partners from predators. What can be concluded from this fourth tip? So that other people do not arbitrarily interfere with potential partners or partners, it never hurts to show the nature of belonging. It also must be done for those who are married, considering there are children who must be protected by their feelings.
5. Male rats sing or make noise to attract female attention. You certainly don't need to take singing classes to attract the attention of your partner. An unforgettable voice indeed managed to make a couple intoxicated. Nothing wrong with a shower while singing, right?
6. The male peacock exhibits the beauty of its feathers to the female. In fact, males in some species of birds are given feathers with beautiful colors to attract females. What can be captured from this fact? Take care of yourself to make it look clean and attractive.
7. Some other birds try hard to build beautiful nests for the sake of the female. Build a residence as beautiful as possible to attract the attention of your partner. Beautiful homes not only provide comfort for the residents. The beautiful house also depicts the perfect life of its inhabitants.
8. Most male insects give prizes for attracting female attention. Do not hesitate to give gifts to potential partners to show seriousness towards him.
